name: Our last flight
description:
In this game you will be playing the girl who is a little scared but still likes to get to know new people. She, like the other girls on this train, goes to the "big city" - each with their own purpose. But on such a seemingly ordinary trip, you will have to know the riddle that the owner of the train hides. The rest of the passengers also feel the tension that grows with each day. Can you investigate what is happening here? Can you get to know each passenger well enough to write your book and maybe even... for something more?

Game available on english and russian.

I hope you can find out the "real" ending, because it's not as easy as you think.

If you find errors or bugs - just let me know and I will try to fix them as soon as I can.

Enjoy the game!
